content.p: Welcome. We hope that you find all the information you need here regarding pension arrangements at the University. Contributing to your pension allows you to build up a pot of money to provide for yourself and your family in retirement. As well as your contributions, the University contributes too, and you will receive tax relief. Benefits also include death in service provision and other pension scheme-specific family benefits. Our Pensions Team are available to help you. Please contact us by email in the first instance and we'll get back to you as soon as possible. Latest news on the pension schemes offered by the University The schemes we have available Enrolling in a pension scheme Saving extra for retirement Support and advice for staff planning to retire What to do upon leaving How to make your pension wishes known Pension support to bereaved families FAQs for you to access advice quickly How to get in contact with our team
